backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all core types (Report, Activity, UserProfile, etc.) and importing authorization, blob storage, and user approval mixins for the Museus Centro monthly reporting system.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that ReportFormPage and ActivityFormPage are non-read-only and fully editable/submittable for coordinator users in create mode.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of every frontend source file, describing their purpose and notable fixes or changes.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, chart colors, sidebar, etc.).
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA, setting the page title to 'Museus Centro – Relatório Mensal Individual 2026' and mounting the app at `#root`.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all application routes, handles authentication via Internet Identity, shows a login page or profile setup modal, and renders a role-based sidebar layout.
frontend/src/components/ActivitiesList.t: Displays a list of activities for a given report as cards with status badges, classification, hours, and audience info, plus a 'Nova Atividade' button when editing is allowed.
frontend/src/components/ApprovalDetailVi: Read-only report detail view for Coordination/Admin users that shows report fields and activities, and provides coordinator comment input, signature canvas, and approve/return-for-revision actions.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Activi: Recharts bar chart that displays activity counts per museum, truncating long museum names and applying a rotating color palette.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Audien: Recharts pie chart that visualizes audience breakdown by demographic profile (children, youth, adults, elderly, PCD) using labeled slices.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/KPICar: Reusable KPI card component displaying a label, numeric value, icon, and optional description with four color variants (default, accent, success, warning).
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Monthl: Recharts line chart that plots monthly audience totals sorted chronologically, mapping ISO month keys to Portuguese abbreviations.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Planne: Renders a grouped bar chart comparing planned (quantitative goal) vs achieved results for goal-linked activities, using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Report: Renders a bar chart showing report counts per month, sorted by a predefined academic-year month order, using Recharts.
Renders a bar chart displaying report counts per museum with truncated labels and angled X-axis ticks, using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/ExportConsolidat: Admin-only button that aggregates all reports and activities into a map and triggers a CSV/Excel export via `generateExcelExport`, showing loading and error toasts.
frontend/src/components/ExportReportPDFB: Simple button component that calls `generateReportPDF` with a given report and its activities to trigger a PDF download.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper that renders the Sidebar alongside a content area and a footer with copyright and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that collects a new user's full name and role (professional, coordination, or administration) and saves the profile via `useSaveCallerUserProfile`.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Collapsible navigation sidebar that shows role-based nav items (reports, approvals, dashboard, consolidated view, user management, admin) and a logout button using the user's Internet Identity.
A forwardRef canvas component supporting mouse and touch drawing for capturing signatures, exposing `getSignatureBase64`, `clear`, and `isEmpty` methods via an imperative handle.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks (queries and mutations) for interacting with the backend actor, covering user profiles, approvals, reports, and dashboard data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles, CSS custom properties for a navy-based institutional color palette (light and dark modes), and reusable component utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ActivityFormPage.tsx: A form page for creating and editing activities, with fields for status, classification, accessibility, evidence, and other activity metadata. Supports both create and update modes using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/pages/ApprovalsPage.tsx: Displays a filterable list of all reports for coordinators to review and approve, with status stats and a detail view for individual report approval.
frontend/src/pages/ConsolidatedMuseumPag: Shows aggregated activity and report data for a selected museum, month, and year, with options to export consolidated PDF and CSV reports.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: A coordination/admin dashboard displaying KPI cards and charts (reports by museum, month, activities) with filters for month, museum, and professional name.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: A login page for the Museus Centro system that authenticates users via Internet Identity, displaying the project branding and a login button.
frontend/src/pages/PendingApprovalPage.t: A holding page shown to users whose accounts are awaiting coordinator approval, with options to resend the approval request or log out.
frontend/src/pages/ReportFormPage.tsx: A form page for creating and editing monthly reports, supporting draft/submit workflows with role-based read-only logic, activity management, and PDF export.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsListPage.tsx: A list page displaying all or user-specific reports with filtering by status, month, and museum, plus summary stats and navigation to create new reports.
frontend/src/pages/UserManagementPage.ts: An admin page for managing user profiles, including approving pending users, editing roles/museums, and deleting accounts.
frontend/src/utils/audienceValidation.ts: Exports a single utility function that validates audience demographic breakdowns do not exceed the reported total audience count.
frontend/src/utils/consolidatedCsvGenera: Generates and downloads a consolidated CSV file combining report metadata and their associated activities, with Portuguese label mappings for enums.
frontend/src/utils/consolidatedPdfGenera: Generates a consolidated HTML-based PDF document summarizing multiple reports and their activities, including aggregate totals for audience, activities, and hours.
frontend/src/utils/excelGenerator.ts: Generates and downloads a CSV/Excel export of reports and their activities, mapping enum values to Portuguese labels and formatting dates and audience data into rows.
frontend/src/utils/labels.ts: Provides exported helper functions that convert backend enum values (MuseumLocation, Month, Status, ActivityStatus, etc.) to human-readable Portuguese label strings.
frontend/src/utils/pdfGenerator.ts: Generates a printable HTML-based PDF for a single report and its activities, rendering report metadata and per-activity details with Portuguese labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading URL query parameters (including from hash-based routes), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that sets up dark mode, custom color palettes (navy, teal, semantic tokens via CSS variables), typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, and pending feature requests (AR-1 through AR-4) related to adding coordinator role permissions for report/activity creation on both backend and frontend.
